title: Has man never learned from philosophies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some people did learn others did not; however, those who did learn, they have their ways of interpretation to what they have learned. For example, two people read one book, the same book same edition, at the same circumstances, we will find out that everyone has understood it in a different way, and if we asked them to write-down what they have understood, they will come up with a new different products, which make it unique and exciting.
Well they’re all different. Only one of them can be right, or all of them wrong. You decide which you think is right then learn from that, not learn from all of them.
